Taste of Budapest

Goulash

Hungary’s national dish — a hearty stew of beef, paprika, and vegetables.

Lángos

A popular fried flatbread, often topped with sour cream and cheese, but also available with other toppings.

Chimney Cake

Sweet, spiral-shaped pastry grilled over open flame and coated in sugar, cinnamon or nuts before baking, creating a crunchy crust.

Dobos Cake

A layered sponge cake with chocolate, glazed with caramel and nuts. It is the most famous dessert in Hungary.
